headline: Akamai Empowers Partners to Deliver Services and Support
summary: Akamai Technologies (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, today announced updates to its Security Certified Service Provider programs for API security solutions and for Akamai Guardicore Segmentation. Certified partners can now offer Day-2 Operations Services related to Akamai API security products and solutions, just as they do for Akamai Guardicore Segmentation.
